entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing rain. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing rain. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
